text: Ani sarvasrestha allaha tya vastice udaharana sadara karato, ji sukha-santipurvaka hoti. Tici roji (ajivivaka) ticyajavala susampannatesaha sarva marganni caluna yeta hoti, maga tya vastine allahacya krpa denagyanca inkara kela, tevha sarvasrestha allahane tila bhuka ani bhayaca svada cakhavila. Ha mobadala hota tyancya va'ita karmanca
